title: Intro
description: Delve into the technical journey behind RustGPT, a ChatGPT clone engineered with Rust, Axum, HTMX, and Tailwind CSS. Discover the motivations for selecting this stack, the challenges tackled, and the triumphs of building a lean and efficient chatbot platform. This article unveils the project's inner workings and shares insights into the future of web development through the lens of RustGPT.
